labels.name: dependencies

candidates.body:
Bumps [libc](https://github.com/rust-lang/libc) from 0.2.104 to 0.2.107.
Release notes

Sourced from libc's releases.

0.2.107

What's Changed

  • Release 0.2.106 to incorporate build fix for #2484 by @​joshtriplett in rust-lang/libc#2494
  • solarish sendfilev fn flavor by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2497
  • Skip CI on sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu for now by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2503
  • DragonFly's devname_r takes a size_t len parameter by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2489
  • Declare clock_settime for macOS. by @​DimitrisJim in rust-lang/libc#2496
  • fix cmsg test proposal by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2501
  • sparc64: Update debian image to 11 (2021-10-20) to fix segfault on CI by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2504
  • netbsd/openbsd add AI_* constants by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2495
  • Enable clock_gettime on wasi by @​coolreader18 in rust-lang/libc#2499
  • Use link modifiers -bundle on musl and wasi target by @​12101111 in rust-lang/libc#2272
  • Add getresgid and getresuid to DragonFly, FreeBSD and OpenBSD by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2505
  • add SO_*_FILTER for Android by @​hhyhhy in rust-lang/libc#2506
  • haiku: add missing ifaddrs definitions by @​jessicah in rust-lang/libc#2510
  • Add procctl data constants on freebsd by @​niluxv in rust-lang/libc#2511
  • netbsd libutil update by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2512
  • win32 remove deprecated winapi part by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2513
  • Document stat.st_blksize changes on DragonFly BSD by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2487
  • netbsd add MAP_ALIGNED aliases by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2516
  • Add memfd_create to linux and android by @​jwellhofer in rust-lang/libc#2069
  • Add TCGETS2 and TCSETS2 (and variants) ioctl constants for Linux. by @​de-vri-es in rust-lang/libc#2508
  • netbsd ext attrs api addition by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2514
  • linux/android add POSIX_SPAWN_USEVFORK (mostly no-op now) extension. by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2509
  • freebsd ptrace request update by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2517
  • Move termios2 struct and ioctl constants to linux::arch::*. by @​de-vri-es in rust-lang/libc#2518
  • FreeBSD: add eventfd (since 13) by @​unrelentingtech in rust-lang/libc#2468
  • Bump libc to 0.2.107 by @​workingjubilee in rust-lang/libc#2515

New Contributors

  • @​12101111 made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2272
  • @​hhyhhy made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2506
  • @​jwellhofer made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2069

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rust-lang/libc/compare/0.2.106...0.2.107

0.2.105

What's Changed

  • Haiku: Add utmpx functions and constants by @​GrayJack in rust-lang/libc#2460
  • Fix most libc-test compile warnings and errors for DragonFly by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2461
  • Deprecate XU_NGROUPS on DragonFly by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2462
  • netbsd add missing posix_spawn constants. by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2464
  • Adds pthread_mutexattr_[g|s]etrobust and pthread_mutex_consistent bindings by @​awidegreen in rust-lang/libc#2455
  • Freebsd items by @​GuillaumeGomez in rust-lang/libc#2451
  • add more errno constants to uclibc by @​atopia in rust-lang/libc#2466
  • apple further Big Sur update adding few more fn. by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2459
  • Properly expose more constants on FreeBSD by @​asomers in rust-lang/libc#2465
  • Add fexecve() to DragonFly by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2467
  • Adding some NT_* consts from elf.h by @​irgstg in rust-lang/libc#2463
  • Add missing CPU_* macros to android, and sync with Linux by @​joshtriplett in rust-lang/libc#2470

... (truncated)

Commits
  • cd5de2f Auto merge of #2515 - workingjubilee:bump-ver, r=JohnTitor
  • 38c16a9 Auto merge of #2468 - unrelentingtech:fbsd-efd, r=JohnTitor
  • 57492ef FreeBSD: add eventfd (since 13)
  • 25ea72c Auto merge of #2518 - de-vri-es:move-termios2-to-arch, r=Amanieu
  • 16c69c0 Auto merge of #2517 - devnexen:fbsd_ptrace_requpdate, r=JohnTitor
  • c199251 freebsd ptrace request update
  • 3a529d0 Move termios2 struct and ioctl constants to linux::arch.
  • bcfd392 Auto merge of #2509 - devnexen:linux_posix_spawn_usevfork, r=Amanieu
  • 7877856 linux add POSIX_SPAWN_USEVFORK (mostly no-op now) extension.
  • 2af710a Auto merge of #2514 - devnexen:netbsd_xattr_api, r=Amanieu
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

candidates.body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.13.0

1.13.0 (October 29, 2021)

Fixed

  • sync: fix Notify to clone the waker before locking its waiter list (#4129)
  • tokio: add riscv32 to non atomic64 architectures (#4185)

Added

  • net: add poll_{recv,send}_ready methods to udp and uds_datagram (#4131)
  • net: add try_*, readable, writable, ready, and peer_addr methods to split halves (#4120)
  • sync: add blocking_lock to Mutex (#4130)
  • sync: add watch::Sender::send_replace (#3962, #4195)
  • sync: expand Debug for Mutex<T> impl to unsized T (#4134)
  • tracing: instrument time::Sleep (#4072)
  • tracing: use structured location fields for spawned tasks (#4128)

Changed

  • io: add assert in copy_bidirectional that poll_write is sensible (#4125)
  • macros: use qualified syntax when polling in select! (#4192)
  • runtime: handle block_on wakeups better (#4157)
  • task: allocate callback on heap immediately in debug mode (#4203)
  • tokio: assert platform-minimum requirements at build time (#3797)

Documented

  • docs: conversion of doc comments to indicative mood (#4174)
  • docs: add returning on the first error example for try_join! (#4133)
  • docs: fixing broken links in tokio/src/lib.rs (#4132)
  • signal: add example with background listener (#4171)
  • sync: add more oneshot examples (#4153)
  • time: document Interval::tick cancel safety (#4152)

candidates.body:
Bumps [http](https://github.com/hyperium/http) from 0.2.4 to 0.2.5.
Release notes

Sourced from http's releases.

v0.2.5

  • Add is_empty() and len() methods to Extensions.
  • Add version_ref() method to request::Builder.
  • Implement TryFrom<Vec<u8>> and TryFrom<String> for Authority, Uri, PathAndQuery, and HeaderName.
  • Make HeaderValue::from_static a const fn.
Changelog

Sourced from http's changelog.

0.2.5 (September 21, 2021)

  • Add is_empty() and len() methods to Extensions.
  • Add version_ref() method to request::Builder.
  • Implement TryFrom<Vec<u8>> and TryFrom<String> for Authority, Uri, PathAndQuery, and HeaderName.
  • Make HeaderValue::from_static a const fn.
Commits
  • ead020c v0.2.5
  • cc2f3ed extensions: add methods to detect the presence of extensions (#497)
  • d2fda20 request: add Builder::version_ref to query the version in use (#495)
  • 58c6290 Minor changes to var names in examples (#493)
  • e54da71 HeaderValue::from_static can be const (#481)
  • 1179d6f Fix typo in docs (#482)
  • 73c723e Add missing TryFrom<String> and TryFrom<Vec> impls. (#477)
  • fc49fe3 Add TryFrom implementations for owned types for HeaderName (#479)

Fixes #115 

This adds a (relatively) simple file server example with appropriate checking for dot-segments and symlinks. It displays a directory listing with links and picks a MIME type based on the filename.

candidates.title: add maintainer docs and Cargo.lock
candidates.body:
This PR:

* adds docs for maintainers that cover publishing a new release and our use of Dependabot
* adds Cargo.lock, as recommended by @cbiffle (and documents why we do it)
* updates CI to enforce that Cargo.lock is correct by building with `--locked`.

If the Cargo.lock check-in is controversial, I can do that in a separate PR.  It's here because I thought I'd already done it, so I documented it, and then realized that I hadn't actually done it yet, and it didn't seem worth splitting out.

CC @ahl @smklein.  I think there are probably too many words here, but I wanted to err on the side of more docs rather than less.

chosen_pr.title: Bump tokio from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

chosen_pr.body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.13.0

1.13.0 (October 29, 2021)

Fixed

  • sync: fix Notify to clone the waker before locking its waiter list (#4129)
  • tokio: add riscv32 to non atomic64 architectures (#4185)

Added

  • net: add poll_{recv,send}_ready methods to udp and uds_datagram (#4131)
  • net: add try_*, readable, writable, ready, and peer_addr methods to split halves (#4120)
  • sync: add blocking_lock to Mutex (#4130)
  • sync: add watch::Sender::send_replace (#3962, #4195)
  • sync: expand Debug for Mutex<T> impl to unsized T (#4134)
  • tracing: instrument time::Sleep (#4072)
  • tracing: use structured location fields for spawned tasks (#4128)

Changed

  • io: add assert in copy_bidirectional that poll_write is sensible (#4125)
  • macros: use qualified syntax when polling in select! (#4192)
  • runtime: handle block_on wakeups better (#4157)
  • task: allocate callback on heap immediately in debug mode (#4203)
  • tokio: assert platform-minimum requirements at build time (#3797)

Documented

  • docs: conversion of doc comments to indicative mood (#4174)
  • docs: add returning on the first error example for try_join! (#4133)
  • docs: fixing broken links in tokio/src/lib.rs (#4132)
  • signal: add example with background listener (#4171)
  • sync: add more oneshot examples (#4153)
  • time: document Interval::tick cancel safety (#4152)
